name: Fury (itch)
description:
Fury is a first-person multiplayer shooter that supports up to 8 players. Fight your way to the victory. Whoever has the highest score by the end of the match wins!

Controls: WASD to move, mouse to look around, left click mouse to shoot, TAB to view the scoreboard.

Instructions on how to connect: one player connects by pressing "LAN Host." Other players connect to the game by entering the host's IP address in "localhost" field and pressing "LAN Client" button.
